articles.author: David McKenzie
articles.title: South Africa loaded arms onto sanctioned Russian vessel, US ambassador tells local media - CNN
articles.description: The US ambassador to South Africa on Thursday accused the South African government of delivering arms and ammunition to a sanctioned Russian cargo vessel late last year, local media said.
articles.content:
Johannesburg, South AfricaCNN
  —
